Instructions for varying:

  • x-break 
  • w - increase brightness 
  • s - decrease brightness 
  • d - increase contrast 
  • a - decrease contrast 
  • e - increase saturation 
  • q - decrease saturation 
  • z - increase exposure 
  • c - decrease exposure
